bio: Passionate developer with 13 years of experience, Renato has been focused on Kotlin/JVM backends for the past few years, focusing especially on being a transformation agent for teams wishing to adopt Kotlin, and utilize its amazing features such as Coroutines to handle complex usecases at scale.
title: Software Engineer
name: Renato Costa
shortBio: Passionate developer with 13 years of experience, Renato has been focused on Kotlin/JVM backends for the past few years, focusing especially on being a transformation agent for teams wishing to adopt Kotlin, and utilize its amazing features such as Coroutines to handle complex usecases at scale.
